pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimator of the Adherer Average Causal Effect // Estimate the causal treatment effect for subjects that can adhere to one or both of the treatments. Given longitudinal data with missing observations, consistent causal effects are calculated. Unobserved potential outcomes are estimated through direct integration as described in: Qu et al., (2019) doi:10.1080/19466315.2019.1700157 and Zhang et. al., (2021) doi:10.1080/19466315.2021.1891965.
